WorkItem.Description: In a TypeScript file, after creating a string that spans several lines, using the '\' continuation character, breakpoints that are set in Visual Studio below that string no longer correspond to the correct code line at runtime.
WorkItem.Summary: Breakpoints for TypeScript files in Visual Studio
